description.value:
Wondrous item, common
This quiver holds 20 arrows. However, when you draw and fire the last arrow from the quiver, it magically produces a 21st arrow. Once this arrow has been drawn and fired, the quiver doesnâ€™t produce another arrow until the quiver has been refilled and another 20 arrows have been drawn and fired.
